format:
>
{{ obj.dow }} {{ obj.max_temp }} {{ obj.min_temp }} {{ obj.narrative }} {{ obj.night.pop }} {{ obj.night.rh }} {{ obj.night.clds }} {{ obj.day.pop }} {{ obj.day.rh }} {{ obj.day.clds }}

name: css

format: {{ obj.event_desc }} {{ obj.severity }} {{ obj.urgency }} {{ obj.certainty }} {{ obj.area_id }} {{ obj.area_name }} {{ obj.headline_text }}

name: css

template:
[
        {
			"class": "Alert-Type",

			"certainty": "Certainty",
			"area_id": "Area-ID",
			"area_name": "Area-Name",
			"headline_text": "Headline"
